name: Guess The Video Game -Steam edition
description:
Guess the video game will test your knowledge about video games on Steam! 

Can you guess which game the logo, screenshot or review belongs to? 

Includes various submodes such as a difficulty select, and endless mode and even a versus mode for a two player face-off. 

Note: The current version only includes 150 different games. It's proven quite time consuming to add new entries, and as this was more a test of my skills if I would be able to create a small video game on my own. If you like the game, be sure to send me a message and motivate me to keep adding entries! Thank you in advance.

Feel free to contact me on guessthevideogame@gmail.com for feedback, requests or just to say hi!
